actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: Expressing support for designation of September as Childhood Cancer Awareness Month.

summary.text: Expresses support for the designation of Childhood Cancer Awareness Month. Applauds the actions of medical professionals and other caregivers, researchers, patients and their families, and others who strive to combat and raise public awareness of childhood cancer.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of September as Childhood Cancer Awareness Month.
